meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the June 18, 2024 City Council Meeting

agenda_items.title: Appointments to Boards and Commissions
agenda_items.description: Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions and the evaluation and duties of board and commission members.

agenda_items.title: Casting of Lots
agenda_items.description: Casting of lots to identify the recommended vendor resulting from tie bids between Living Earth and The Organic Recycler on Group 1 Line 4 in response to bid BY24-00024715 for a three-year master agreement for the purchase of a variety of mulching materials.

agenda_items.title: Charter Review Process Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the charter review process and voter-submitted charter amendment petitions, Dallas Freedom Act and Dallas HERO; and discussion of the Mayor and City Councilmember Salaries Amendment in the 2024 Charter Review Commission’s Final Report and newly-submitted councilmember-proposed charter amendments.

agenda_items.title: Pension System Update
agenda_items.description: Dallas Police and Fire Pension System (DPFPS) and Employee Retirement Fund (ERF): Funding Soundness Restoration Plan Update and Consideration of Recommendations.

agenda_items.title: Attorney Briefings
agenda_items.description: Seeking the advice of the City Attorney regarding: (1) City of Dallas v. Employees' Retirement Fund of City of Dallas. (2) The city’s management contract with Fair Park First.
